jsl.utilities.random.distributions
Class Exponential

java.lang.Object
  jsl.utilities.random.AbstractRandom
      jsl.utilities.random.distributions.Distribution
          jsl.utilities.random.distributions.Exponential
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableIfc, GetValueIfc, IdentityIfc, NewInstanceIfc, CDFIfc, ContinuousDistributionIfc, DistributionFunctionIfc, DistributionIfc, MeanIfc, PDFIfc, VarianceIfc, ParametersIfc, RandomIfc, RandomStreamIfc, SampleIfc
public class Exponential
extends Distribution
implements ContinuousDistributionIfc

Models exponentially distributed random variables This distribution is commonly use to model the time between events

invCDF

public final double invCDF(double prob)
Provides the inverse cumulative distribution function for the distribution

Specified by:
invCDF in interface CDFIfc
Parameters:
prob - The probability to be evaluated for the inverse, prob must be [0,1] or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. p = 0.0 returns 0.0 p = 1.0 returns Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
Returns:
The inverse cdf evaluated at prob

pdf
